publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3140 Mrs Mary Mulligan: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.4) (Scotland) Order 2002 â€”That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.4) (Scotland) Order 2002 (SSI 2002/231), recommends that the Order be approved. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm*
